mapper.select: /* TreviewMapper.xml id="selectTreviewList" */ SELECT X.RNUM , TRUNC((X.RNUM - 1) / #{rows}, 0) + 1 AS PAGE , #{rows} AS "rows" , #{page_rows} AS "page_rows" , X.CNT_TOTAL , TRUNC(X.CNT_TOTAL / #{rows}, 0) + 1 AS CNT_PAGE , TRUNC(TRUNC((X.RNUM - 1) / #{rows}, 0) / #{page_rows}, 0) * #{page_rows} + 1 AS START_PAGE , RB.* , SUBSTR(RB.REVIEWCONTENT, 1, 100) AS REVIEWCONTENTSHORT , TO_CHAR(RB.REVIEWDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REVIEWDATESTR , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE REVIEWNO = RB.REVIEWNO) AS CNT_REPLY FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RB.REVIEWNO DESC) AS RNUM , COUNT(*) OVER() AS CNT_TOTAL , RB.REVIEWNO FROM REVIEW_BOARD RB ) X INNER JOIN REVIEW_BOARD RB ON RB.REVIEWNO = X.REVIEWNO WHERE X.RNUM BETWEEN (#{rows} * (#{page} - 1)) + 1 AND (#{rows} * (#{page} - 0)) ORDER BY X.RNUM ASC
/* TreviewMapper.xml id="selectMaxKey" */ SELECT NVL(MAX(REVIEWNO), 0) + 1 AS "KEY" FROM REVIEW_BOARD

/* TreviewMapper.xml id="selectOrderList" */ SELECT PD.PRODUCTNO , PD.PRODUCTNAME , PD.PRODUCTPRICE , PD.SCHEDULE /*, TO_CHAR(PD.SCHEDULE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULESTR*/ , PD.CITY , PD.COUNTRY , OP.ORDERNO , OP.ORDERDATE /*, TO_CHAR(OP.ORDERDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDERDATESTR*/ , OP.QUANTITY FROM PRODUCT PD INNER JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT OP ON OP.PRODUCTNO = PD.PRODUCTNO ORDER BY PD.PRODUCTNO DESC

/* TreviewMapper.xml id="selectTreview" */ SELECT RB.* , TO_CHAR(RB.REVIEWDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REVIEWDATESTR , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE REVIEWNO = RB.REVIEWNO) AS CNT_REPLY FROM REVIEW_BOARD RB WHERE RB.REVIEWNO = #{reviewno}

/* TreviewMapper.xml id="selectTreviewReplyList" */ SELECT X.RNUM , TRUNC((X.RNUM - 1) / #{rows}, 0) + 1 AS PAGE , #{rows} AS "rows" , #{page_rows} AS "page_rows" , X.CNT_TOTAL , TRUNC(X.CNT_TOTAL / #{rows}, 0) + 1 AS CNT_PAGE , TRUNC(TRUNC((X.RNUM - 1) / #{rows}, 0) / #{page_rows}, 0) * #{page_rows} + 1 AS START_PAGE , RR.* , TO_CHAR(RR.CREATED_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_DT_STR FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RR.REPLYNO DESC) AS RNUM , COUNT(*) OVER() AS CNT_TOTAL , RR.REPLYNO FROM REVIEW_REPLY RR WHERE RR.REVIEWNO = #{reviewno} ) X INNER JOIN REVIEW_REPLY RR ON RR.REPLYNO = X.REPLYNO WHERE X.RNUM BETWEEN (#{rows} * (#{page} - 1)) + 1 AND (#{rows} * (#{page} - 0)) ORDER BY X.RNUM ASC

/* TreviewMapper.xml id="selectTreviewByKey" */ SELECT RB.* , TO_CHAR(RB.REVIEWDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REVIEWDATESTR , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE REVIEWNO = RB.REVIEWNO) AS CNT_REPLY FROM REVIEW_BOARD RB WHERE RB.IMG_KEY = #{img_key}
